name: backend-habit-tracker
description: This is Basic Habit Tracking Application for Users to Track Daily Habits for a week and this file is Readme for this Web Application.  It's a Web App built with Node.js and EJS. It allows users to define habits and track their progress on a daily basis for a week. ## Contributed By:- Arpan Choudhury ![image](https://github.com/DataWorker2001/Habit-Tracker-Backend/assets/123379937/5c854218-a61c-4142-8715-1720fa48de2a)
